**皮斗篷**（leather cloak）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[斗篷](/wiki/%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "斗篷")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[雇佣兵](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%87%E4%BD%A3%E5%85%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雇佣兵 (page does not exist)")类怪物有1⁄2在生成时[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一件皮斗篷[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。[学者](/index.php?title=%E5%AD%A6%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "学者 (page does not exist)")、[护理者](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%90%86%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护理者 (page does not exist)")、[方丈](/index.php?title=%E6%96%B9%E4%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "方丈 (page does not exist)")、[侍祭](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%8D%E7%A5%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侍祭 (page does not exist)")、[导游](/index.php?title=%E5%AF%BC%E6%B8%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "导游 (page does not exist)")和[魔法学徒](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E5%AD%A6%E5%BE%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法学徒 (page does not exist)")生成时有4⁄15的概率获得一件皮斗篷[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。[酋长](/index.php?title=%E9%85%8B%E9%95%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "酋长 (page does not exist)")、[实习骑士](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%9E%E4%B9%A0%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "实习骑士 (page does not exist)")、[禅师](/index.php?title=%E7%A6%85%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "禅师 (page does not exist)")和[战士](/index.php?title=%E6%88%98%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "战士 (page does not exist)")在生成时有1⁄3的概率获得一件皮斗篷[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

## 描述

皮斗篷的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，且能提供[MC](/index.php?title=MC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "MC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")1。

## 策略

虽然比[矮人](/wiki/%E7%9F%AE%E4%BA%BA%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "矮人斗篷")或[兽人斗篷](/wiki/%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "兽人斗篷")要强，皮斗篷一般还是用作前期的临时防具，直到玩家获得实用的魔法斗篷为止。

## 历史

皮斗篷最初于[NetHack 3.4.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.0 "NetHack 3.4.0")加入游戏。皮斗篷的加入主要是为了解决[人类](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%BA%E7%B1%BB%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "人类（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")怪物携带[精灵斗篷](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E6%96%97%E7%AF%B7 "精灵斗篷")生成的违和感。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Leather_cloak/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

In some variants with [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials "Object materials") systems, the leather cloak may be renamed to a **plain cloak** or simply a **cloak**.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), various cloaks and other items retain their higher MC when worn, and many of them can be [upgraded](/wiki/Upgraded "Upgraded") or produced by upgrading another cloak - this makes the leather cloak much less desirable, unless a character already has MC2 or better, e.g. from a [cornuthaum](/wiki/Cornuthaum "Cornuthaum") or [mithril-coat](/wiki/Mithril-coat "Mithril-coat").

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), the leather cloak is simply known as a "cloak", with its material always appended to its name - a cloak grants 0 base AC, 2 base [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and MC1 while worn.

[Binders](/wiki/Binder "Binder") that do not start the game with a particular inventory will begin with a leather cloak, including [incantifier](/wiki/Incantifier "Incantifier") Binders. [Human](/wiki/Human_\(starting_race\) "Human (starting race)"), incantifier, [vampire](/wiki/Vampire_\(starting_race_in_dNetHack\) "Vampire (starting race in dNetHack)"), and [elven](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") [Nobles](/wiki/Noble "Noble") start each game with a +1 leather cloak, as do non-[drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") [Troubadours](/wiki/Troubadour "Troubadour").

[Mayor Cummerbund](/wiki/Mayor_Cummerbund "Mayor Cummerbund") is always generated with a leather cloak, and player monster [exiles](/wiki/Exile_\(player_monster\) "Exile (player monster)") will always generate with a leather cloak.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), the item is renamed to a plain cloak.

A plain cloak can be combined with an [amulet of guarding](/wiki/Amulet_of_guarding "Amulet of guarding") at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") to create a cloak of protection.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), the item is known simply as a "cloak" with its material appended to its name (e.g., a [dragonhide](/wiki/Dragonhide "Dragonhide") cloak). Its base material is leather.

[The Paladin](/wiki/Paladin_\(monster\) "Paladin (monster)") always generates with a regular cloak, and [cultists](/wiki/Cultist "Cultist") have an effective 4⁄15 chance of generating with a regular cloak. Mercenaries that can wear cloaks and do not generate with a racial cloak have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a regular cloak, and [gnolls](/wiki/Gnoll_\(monster_attribute\) "Gnoll (monster attribute)") have a 1⁄5 chance of generating with a regular cloak.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), the [Ninja](/wiki/Ninja_\(role\) "Ninja (role)") starts each game with a +1 leather cloak. Bards also start each game with a +1 leather cloak, as in dNetHack.

The [Crown Royal Cloak](/wiki/Crown_Royal_Cloak "Crown Royal Cloak") is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") leather cloak that is the first [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift") for [Drunks](/wiki/Drunk "Drunk").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), the item is renamed to a plain cloak.

Upgrading a plain cloak will produce a [mummy wrapping](/wiki/Mummy_wrapping "Mummy wrapping"), and vice versa.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 649](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L649)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 282](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L282)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 297](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L297)

皮斗篷（leather cloak）是NetHack中的一种斗篷类防具。它由皮革制成。

生成

雇佣兵类怪物有1⁄2在生成时获得一件皮斗篷[1]。学者、护理者、方丈、侍祭、导游和魔法学徒生成时有4⁄15的概率获得一件皮斗篷[2]。酋长、实习骑士、禅师和战士在生成时有1⁄3的概率获得一件皮斗篷[3]。

描述

皮斗篷的基础AC加成为1，且能提供MC1。

策略

虽然比矮人或兽人斗篷要强，皮斗篷一般还是用作前期的临时防具，直到玩家获得实用的魔法斗篷为止。

历史

皮斗篷最初于NetHack 3.4.0加入游戏。皮斗篷的加入主要是为了解决人类怪物携带精灵斗篷生成的违和感。

Variants

In some variants with object materials systems, the leather cloak may be renamed to a plain cloak or simply a cloak.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, various cloaks and other items retain their higher MC when worn, and many of them can be upgraded or produced by upgrading another cloak - this makes the leather cloak much less desirable, unless a character already has MC2 or better, e.g. from a cornuthaum or mithril-coat.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, the leather cloak is simply known as a "cloak", with its material always appended to its name - a cloak grants 0 base AC, 2 base DR and MC1 while worn.

Binders that do not start the game with a particular inventory will begin with a leather cloak, including incantifier Binders. Human, incantifier, vampire, and elven Nobles start each game with a +1 leather cloak, as do non-drow Troubadours.

Mayor Cummerbund is always generated with a leather cloak, and player monster exiles will always generate with a leather cloak.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, the item is renamed to a plain cloak.

A plain cloak can be combined with an amulet of guarding at a furnace to create a cloak of protection.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, the item is known simply as a "cloak" with its material appended to its name (e.g., a dragonhide cloak). Its base material is leather.

The Paladin always generates with a regular cloak, and cultists have an effective 4⁄15 chance of generating with a regular cloak. Mercenaries that can wear cloaks and do not generate with a racial cloak have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with a regular cloak, and gnolls have a 1⁄5 chance of generating with a regular cloak.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, the Ninja starts each game with a +1 leather cloak. Bards also start each game with a +1 leather cloak, as in dNetHack.

The Crown Royal Cloak is an artifact leather cloak that is the first sacrifice gift for Drunks.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, the item is renamed to a plain cloak.

Upgrading a plain cloak will produce a mummy wrapping, and vice versa.
